FuncDef: The display ds-lite instance command displays the configuration of a specific or all created DS-Lite instances.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of a DS-Lite instance.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported. When double quotation marks are used around the string, spaces are allowed in the string.

ExtraInfo: To view the configuration of a specific or all created DS-Lite instances, run the display ds-lite instance command. If the instance name is not specified, the configurations of all existing DS-Lite instances are displayed.
